---
title: "Query & Issue Trending"
---

## Why Trending is Critical
Single issues are noise.
Patterns are signals.

## Examples of Trends
- Recurrent missing labs
- Frequent consent corrections
- Repeated data entry delays
- Systematic protocol deviations

## CRA Responsibilities
- Maintain issue logs
- Identify recurring patterns
- Escalate systemic risks
- Support CAPA decisions
